description: Car use will be cut sharply and pedestrians prioritised in a major district of the Catalan capital.
title: Barcelona plans major increase in 'green' zones
title_page: Barcelona plans major increase in 'green' zones - BBC News
maintext: The city authorities are asking the public for ideas on how the 21 new squares and a similar number of tree-lined "green axes" should look. Work is expected to begin in 2022.
